page.title: 13Farming
page.content: Unigate Dairy, St.Erth The dairy occupies a 5 acre site on the improving A.3O trunk road (recently the Hayle By-Pass opened), it is also adjacent to St.Erth railway station, however, altho it was once used by the dairy it is no longer so. Thw dairy employs some 3OO staff and the plant is working 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Fitters employed atthe factory give the necessary coverage. The operation of the milk factory is almost entirely automated and computerized as in the quality control of the various processes. Altogether there are about l million milk bottles in their system, with about 2OO,OOO in daily use, their 'life' is approximately only 2O trips.
